## Understanding sequence: `move`, `color`, `circle` commands

Which program generates the following output?

![question](dot/dot.a.evy.svg)

Choose one correct answer:

- ```evy
  move 50 50
  color "red"
  circle 20
  ```
- ```evy
  move 40 40
  color "red"
  circle 20
  ```
- ```evy
  move 60 60
  color "red"
  circle 10
  ```
- ```evy
  move 50 50
  color "red"
  circle 10
  ```
